original_title: 実録！呪われた都市伝説 怨念 昭和の都市伝説集
overview: This films highlights some of Japanese most infamous urban legends that have been passed down generation by generation. Some of the urban legends included are Kuchisake-onna, Hanako-san, Kokkuri-san and Teke Teke.
title: Authentic Recordings! Cursed Urban Legends: A Collection of Urban Legends from the Showa Era
